parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description:
The domain name of the website. If you do not specify this parameter, the statistics on response status codes of all domain names are queried.

> A forwarding rule must be configured for the domain name. You can call the [DescribeDomains](~~91724~~) operation to query all domain names.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

> This UNIX timestamp must indicate a point in time that is accurate to the minute.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The interval for returning data. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: QueryType
parameters.description:
The source of the statistics. Valid values:

*   **gf**: Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium
*   **upstrem**: origin server

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs in Resource Management. This parameter is empty by default, which indicates that the instance belongs to the default resource group.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The start time of the event. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

> This UNIX timestamp must indicate a point in time that is accurate to the minute.
